description:
Multi is an average-sized girl with black eyes and black hair with rainbow-colored streaks. she wears a grey headband with horns, a black shirt with rainbow stripes and gray shorts. Under her shorts she wears brown-gray leggings and black sneakers with gray soles.
One of Multi`s main talents is the ability to quick-change into different outfits. When using her Wizard Beyblades, she wears an outfit for her "cute self", and when using her Knight Beyblades she wears an outfit for her "cool self".
In her "cute" outfit, Multi wears a pair of headphones, a white top with a black ascot with a yellowish-gray gem, a black corset with a white bow and a black knee length skirt with yellow, green and pink ruffles as well as 3 stripes going on the side. Under her skirt, she wears sheer tights and black boots with silver buckles.
Source: Beyblade Wiki
name: Nanairo Multi
